page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {Hide and seek cont.}I like the game because you find good places to hide and the man can't find you.The thing I don't like about the game is being the man,because I can never find anybody. { Tig:}You find someone to be man and he touches you and says"teen,tig"or something like that.The game goes on like that until someone goes away or if somebody doesnt want to play.I like tig because if you go on the grass you slide everywhere. A game we only play in Auchnagatt is called{Lineo.}There are lines marked outside on the playground,as many people as you want can play.You start off with one man who chases everyone round the lines and tries to catch somebody.If you are caught you are the man.Also if you go off the lines you are it.We all like it.
